perturbation.original_text: The CELEBRITY will be limited to six speaking engagements for the year and      five conference calls per month at the company's discretion.
perturbation.changed_text: The CELEBRITY will be limited to six speaking engagements for the year. The CELEBRITY will be available for conference calls not to exceed five per month and at the discretion of his schedule.
perturbation.explanation: The original text implies the COMPANY decides the 5 monthly conference calls, while the modified text suggests the calls are at the CELEBRITY's discretion, creating a conflict. The later version gives the CELEBRITY control over scheduling, contradicting the original intent.

perturbation.original_text:
TERMS FOR THE CELEBRITY

Work with Jack Zufelt to develop a business strategy that can be implemented within 30 days of the signing of this agreement.      (i)  Identify marketing platform to recruit new distributors      (ii) Develop a recruiting packet for new recruits that are duplicable with           most tools coming from the corporate website and / or inventory.     (iii) CELEBRITY will be available for phone conferences and meeting           participating at any level deemed necessary by the COMPANY.      (iv) CELEBRITY will be available for conference calls not to exceed five           per month and at the discretion of his schedule.      (v)  The terms of this agreement will remain confidential between CELEBRITY           and the COMPANY unless written permission is granted for release by           both parties.
perturbation.changed_text:
TERMS FOR THE CELEBRITY

Work with Jack Zufelt to develop a business strategy that can be implemented within 90 days of the signing of this agreement.      (i)  Identify marketing platform to recruit new distributors      (ii) Develop a recruiting packet for new recruits that are duplicable with           most tools coming from the corporate website and / or inventory.     (iii) CELEBRITY will be available for phone conferences and meeting           participating at any level deemed necessary by the COMPANY.      (iv) CELEBRITY will be available for conference calls not to exceed five           per month and at the discretion of his schedule.      (v)  The terms of this agreement will remain confidential between CELEBRITY           and the COMPANY unless written permission is granted for release by           both parties.
perturbation.explanation: The timeframe for developing the business strategy is changed from 30 to 90 days. This creates a contradiction, as earlier sections might rely on the original 30-day deadline, potentially causing disagreements over expected timelines and performance milestones.

perturbation.original_text: The CELEBRITY will have full release of liability in regards to      product performance and/or law suites resulting from use of the product.      This liability will remain the responsibility of the COMPANY and      manufacturers.
perturbation.changed_text: The CELEBRITY will have shared liability in regards to product performance and/or law suites resulting from use of the product.      This liability will remain the responsibility of the COMPANY and      manufacturers.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states the celebrity has 'full release of liability' but the modified text changes that to 'shared liability' in regards to product performance. This is contradictory and affects the indemnification terms, causing confusion about who bears the responsibility.
